posts.post_title: WTB: Russ Ford Soverign back - FOUND
posts.post_content:
Just like the title says, looking for a Russ Ford NY Amer. with a Sovereign back.  Would also consider a Cycle or Old Mill back, but chances of finding one of those in my budget might be slim to non.

If you have something available, email price and scans to [url]Asmusstephen@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks,
Steve

Found and Thank You for your responses!
